content: --प्राशः, --प्राशनं the ceremony of giving a new-born child food to eat for the first time, one of the 16 {%Saṃskāras%} performed between the 5th and 8th month (usually in the sixth, <ls>Ms. 2. 34</ls>) with preliminary oblations to fire (<ab>Mar.</ab> उष्टावण); <ls>Ms. 2. 34</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 12.</ls>
